responseText: I daresay the state of their gardens suggests that the tribe has moved on for now. Which leaves me wondering - where to next? Fortunately, I have an inkling. Nearby, there's a sort of monument, a map, hewn from the living rock of the Riverlands. It is placed at the top of a prominence just south of here. I believe that the monument is a record of the sites that the Ashen Flame have ordained throughout the ages, places they return to time and again. Go visit this monument at the Top of the World, and see what you make of the carvings. I will remain here in camp and consider my notes.
name: SQ_30_FAS_Raaqir_43
